title: Tomato and Aubergine Bake
ingredients: ['60g plain flour', '55g dry breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons Italian herb seasoning', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons water', '1 small aubergine, sliced into 5mm rounds', '1 tablespoon groundnut oil', '400g tomato-based pasta sauce', '250g ricotta cheese', '80g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tomato, thinly sliced', '225g spaghetti or angel hair pasta']
